                          +--eecs.jago.Robot
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable, Mobile, Monitor, Realism, RobotState, java.lang.Runnable, Visible
public class Robot
extends StandardRobot

This class implements a Robot with a touch sensor and a light sensor. Used primarily to maintain compatability with legacy code that used the v4.0 Robot class/package structure.

Robot

public Robot()

Robot

public Robot(int realism)
Creates a Robot with the specified realism. Realism can be specified using the constants from the Realism interface.
Parameters:
realism - The level of realism.
